statements.impact_statement: Tenant isolation bypass in FastAPI middleware. Critical for multi-tenant SaaS. Could allow cross-tenant data access.
statements.action_statement: Upgrade to fastapi@0.104.2. Review tenant isolation logic. Deploy within 24 hours.

statements.impact_statement: Prototype pollution in Vue.js. Dashboard frontend affected. Potential XSS or DoS.
statements.action_statement: Upgrade to vue@3.3.8. Test dashboard functionality. Deploy within 48 hours.

statements.impact_statement: SQL injection in psycopg2. TimescaleDB and metadata DB affected. KEV-listed vulnerability. PII at risk.
statements.action_statement: URGENT: Upgrade to psycopg2-binary@2.9.10. Review all queries. Deploy within 24 hours per KEV directive.

statements.impact_statement: Path traversal in MinIO SDK. Export service uses MinIO for file storage. Could access other tenants' files.
statements.action_statement: Upgrade to minio@7.2.1. Validate file paths. Deploy within 48 hours.

statements.impact_statement: JWT signature bypass. Authentication service affected. Could allow unauthorized access.
statements.action_statement: Upgrade to pyjwt@2.8.1. Rotate JWT secrets. Deploy within 24 hours.

statements.impact_statement: SQL injection in SQLAlchemy ORM. We use parameterized queries exclusively. Code review confirms no vulnerable patterns.
statements.action_statement: Monitor for changes. Consider upgrading during next maintenance window.

statements.impact_statement: Timing attack in RSA. Used for JWT signing and data encryption. Low exploitability but should be patched.
statements.action_statement: Upgrade to cryptography@41.0.6. Deploy within 72 hours.

statements.impact_statement: SSRF via redirect. We disable redirects in requests configuration. Not exploitable in our deployment.
Redis Lua injection. We do not use Lua scripting in Redis. Feature disabled in configuration.
statements.action_statement: No action required. Verify Lua remains disabled.

statements.impact_statement: Authentication bypass in MinIO server. Object storage affected. KEV-listed. Could allow unauthorized file access.
statements.action_statement: URGENT: Upgrade to minio@2024.01.15. Review access policies. Deploy within 24 hours per KEV directive.
